vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κορβᾶν
(indeclinable), Hebrew qorbān, gift or votive offering for the service of God, [NT+1st c.AD+]:—hence κορβανᾶς, ὁ, the treasury of the temple at Jerusalem, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Corban, a gift dedicated to God
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Corban, a gift dedicated to God
corban, a gift, offering, oblation, anything consecrated to God, Mk. 7:11*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: corbán (palabra hebrea que significa ofrenda a Dios)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 獻給神的祭物, 各耳板 (太 27:6; 可 7:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 献给神的祭物, 各耳板 (太 27:6; 可 7:11)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kho thánh; co-ban; cơ-ban (nghĩa là sự dâng cho Đức Chúa Trời) Tiếng Hê-bơ-rơ (Lê 1:2) H7133
